discussion_comments.comment_body: I got some errors about the image not being present when doing the tagging in a separate command. Think it's related to https://github.com/docker/buildx/issues/59#issuecomment-1168619521 - so I did it in a one-liner instead.

commented_code:
SIGNING_SECRETS=secrets.p12
 
 LOG_PREFIX="--- $(basename "$0"):"
+
+sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y cmake libssl-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev faketime

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -12,6 +12,16 @@ APP_PATH_UNSIGNED="$APP_PATH.unsigned"
 SIGNING_SECRETS=secrets.p12
 
 LOG_PREFIX="--- $(basename "$0"):"
+
+sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y cmake libssl-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev faketime
discussion_comments.comment_body: Suggestion: We should build the dependencies when building the docker images and not in the script that shall just sign.
